headline: Keysight Launches Automated Transmitter Compliance Test Solution for New UALink 1.0 Standard
summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif., October 09, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS) announced the launch of the UALink 1.0 (Ultra Accelerator Link) transmitter test solution, a dedicated compliance test tool for UALink devices. The new test application enables high-speed validation within advanced computing and AI interconnect systems, automating critical electrical measurements to ensure signal integrity and standard conformance at 200 Gb/s link speeds.

content.title: Keysight Launches Automated Transmitter Compliance Test Solution for New UALink 1.0 Standard
content.summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif., October 09, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS) announced the launch of the UALink 1.0 (Ultra Accelerator Link) transmitter test solution, a dedicated compliance test tool for UALink devices. The new test application enables high-speed validation within advanced computing and AI interconnect systems, automating critical electrical measurements to ensure signal integrity and standard conformance at 200 Gb/s link speeds.

thumbnail.caption: The Keysight D90203UAC UALink 1.0 transmitter compliance test application, used with Keysight Infiniium UXR-Series real-time oscilloscopes, streamlines and accelerates high-speed transmitter validation.
